channel.title: QuakeZone.net Blog
channel.description: Your hub for Quake content in the modern age

item.title: QuakeZone is live!
item.description:
Quake is cool. 'Nuff said.
This site is a bit of a tribute to other sites like Quaddicted, QuakeWorld.net and Thresh's Quake Bible. I'm gonna be posting daily Quake content, including custom maps, art, and gameplay tutorials.
Stay tuned!
Thats about it.
Cheers.
Cheers. July 7 2021
